content.p: A graduate job can be defined in several ways but here are just two: it can be a job for which a degree is the minimum entry requirements or a job that a graduate does. Find out about the direct entry route, graduate trainee and graduate training schemes - the most popular ways for graduates to start their working lives. Read Clarissa's story on our blog Read Matthew's story on our blog Find help and advice on CVs, covering letters, application forms and more: Ace the recruitment process with our making applications pages Attend our recruitment fairs throughout the year and talk to recruiters Search for vacancies on My Career from employers targeting you Find vacancies using our list of national and regional websites Go to our A to Z career paths pages for specialist vacancy sources Lilly Koranteng, Communications Officer, Milton Keynes University Hospital NHS Trust Read Lilly's story We've created an online course designed to help you explore and understand your graduate career options. Go to our online course telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
